programme.desc: A bet between two farmers over who can raise the biggest pig goes haywire for the farmhands.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: An oompah land retelling of the Rumplestiltskein story.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: From the security of his treehouse, Tom wages battle with Spike and Jerry.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Quackers cousin, and penguin named Tux, makes life miserable for Tom and Jerry when he insists on trying to devour the fish in Ricks new aquarium.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A lost little lamb appears at Maudes farm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have turned the entire cabin topsy-turvy to organize medieval jousts with the rangers fencing gear. Grizzy, who wishes to recover his couch, tries to straighten up, but is driven out by their fencing foils. To retaliate, Grizzy must find a blade equal to the task. He opts for a fine... frozen swordfish!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the joys of photography with the rangers instant print camera. Grizzy would like to make a beautiful artistic portrait of the she-bear hes in love with, whereas the Lemmings prefer a group photo with a face-making competition: two radically opposed artistic trends!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The fridge in the cabin has changed: its been replaced by a brand new state-of-the-art appliance which analyzes the body fat percentage of whoever wants to serve himself, before selecting the appropriate foodstuffs.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy watches a demonstration of balloon modelling on TV. He decides to make a balloon poodle to offer to the she-bear hes enamored with. By observing Grizzy, the Lemmings discover with enthusiasm that you can blow up modelling balloons far more than regular ones, and that they end up exploding in a shower of tattered strips.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is awakened from his nap by the unpleasant, ongoing sound of Velcro strips being ripped off. The Lemmings have covered their bodies in Velcro and are throwing themselves against a doormat, which serves as their target. Grizzy finds peace and quiet by getting rid of the doormat until the Lemmings realize that bear fur is an ideal support for Velcro.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The she-bear Grizzy is enamored with has lost her favorite flower in an inaccessible spot under a giant boulder. Grizzy tries to lift it: impossible! He decides to start an intensive bodybuilding routine with the rangers electrostimulation machine, but the Lemmings are already using it on a caribou to step up their rodeo.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders build a float to lead the Flower Parade, but Porky wont settle for anything less than Porky Perfect.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg. Bugs and Daffy soon get caught up trying to prove their part of the coaster is the best.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Sam Sheepdog hires The Looney Builders to build him a salon. Sam offers his custom cut only to learn that different folks want different styles. / Pro snowboarder Pepper Polar Bear hires The Looney Builders to build a ski resort. Pepper soon learns that others have different skill levels.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Pro snowboarder Pepper Polar Bear hires The Looney Builders to build a ski resort. Pepper soon learns that others have different skill levels. / The Looney Builders are hired to build a rollercoaster for Looneyburg.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Wile E. Coyote hires The Looney Builders to build him a house in the desert so he can be alone. The Road Runner tries to pay him a visit causing Wile E. to heighten his security measures.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi and Batwing must work together to get past the Legion of Zoom in order to deliver a new giant screen to Batcomputer.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: The Batwheels take on a new vehicular villain who keeps growing bigger and bigger, while learning that size doesnt always win the day.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: While Green Lantern is having his spaceship repaired in the Batcave, the Batwheels want to play with his adorable alien pet, only to discover that this cute critter has wild alien powers!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: To ease the burden on MOE, the Batwheels use his duplicating machine to make copies of their repair bot, but the Batcave is soon overrun when the machine breaks!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When the Legion of Zoom gains control of the Batcaves giant T-Rex, MOE creates a giant Bat-robot to stop the marauding dinosaur.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean drops Irma off at the airport she and Lottie are going on a lovely sunny holiday without them. To cheer Teddy up, Mr Bean has a brainwave - dont worry, well have a holiday right here at home! So Mr Bean goes about recreating all the things he saw in Irmas brochure a flight on an Bean Airways and a stay at Hotel Bean with sea view and a pool! Hope Irma is having a great time too

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: At a funfair, Mr Bean wins a balloon for Teddy and ties it to him while he plays on the hook a duck. But hes so engrossed he doesnt notice his companion floating away! Soon Mr Bean is chasing Teddy as he glides and snags on various fairground rides. Will Mr Bean rescue Teddy before he floats away forever?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs Wicket has just inherited an antique grandfather clock Mr Bean is impressed! But he soon starts to resent it when it bongs loudly on the hour all through the night. Desperate for sleep as dawn is breaking, he fiddles inside the clock, only for it to fall apart and onto the floor! Can he get the bulky heirloom to a repair shop and back before Mrs Wicket wakes up?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean buys an expensive dress for Irma which he plans to return - so has to protect it from damage. / Mr Bean goes to buy the biggest TV in the world only to find that it has a price- tag to match.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers lead Sushi-Mushi to believe that Pickled Swampost is Mushpots favourite dish when he cant stand it. Now they must try to stop Sushi-Mushi from serving this horrible food to Mushpot!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep is the only Mushable who cant bend a small branch back to catapult himself between two trees. He feels weak and embarrassed. But when strength doesnt work, Chep realizes that its all in the technique!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: It seems like Starmush is the only one who can answer Mush-Mushs difficult questions. But Starmush lives so far away in the Dark Forest! Mush-Mush hatches a plan to get Starmush to move to Mushton, so he can get answers right here at home.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Lilit remembers loving balancing on a slack-vine when she was a Mushlet. But actually, she never really learnt how, so she keeps falling off and getting really frustrated.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep and Mush-Mush sometimes dont listen to Lilit. So when she tries to tell them about her great idea to have a special firefly night, they instead believe it is their idea. Grrr! Whose special firefly night will come out on top?

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Bolly hurts his foot and cant go fast until it heals. Phooey! But when everyone gives him treats to cheer him up, Bolly decides he never wants his foot to heal.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are holding a log throwing competition that stops short when Grizzy sends them soaring into the distance.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over the TV remote control. The argument leads the bear to the summit of the castle tower during a storm.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have a whale of a time revamping the paintings on display in the castle by painting themselves alongside the illustrated noblemen.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy puts a stop to the Lemmings furious rodeo game on a sheep. Annoyed, they decide to banish the bear to the bottom of the castle dungeons while hes taking a nap.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While fighting over a jelly cake, Grizzy banishes the Lemmings to the castle dungeons and the rodents discover a passageway leading to a secret elfin room.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take Polaroid snapshots of themselves disguised outside the castle along with a sheep who poses with them.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is pulled out of his dreams by the rambunctious Lemmings who are jousting on sheep. The sly bear gets rid of the rodents by enticing their mounts away with food.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy pursues the Lemmings throughout the castle to recover the jelly cake they stole from him. In an impasse, the bear runs smack into a ghost.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to take Teddy on holiday to the seaside. But when he arrives at his hotel a spoilt little girl wants Teddy all for herself. And her protective dad only wants the best for his princess. An on-going tussle ensues between Mr Bean the little girl and her Dad resulting in a chase across the seaside town and onto the pier. No one comes between Mr Bean Teddy and their relaxing holiday!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is left in peace when Mrs Wicket goes off on her holidays. This means Mr Bean has free access to her daily newspaper. But every time he goes down to collect it from the letterbox it disappears. Someone is taking it but who? Mr Bean is determined to nab the mysterious newspaper stealer and uses a range of ingenious homemade traps in his quest to catch the sneaky thief.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is trying to find a nice quiet place to read his book so he sets off for the Library. But instead of reading he becomes distracted by some funny online videos he sees on the Librarys computer. Before he knows it Mr Bean is recording his own video which is uploaded for everyone to see. Things start to go crazy when people check out his funny video and his popularity takes off. But does Mr Bean enjoy being in the public eye and how long will his celebrity last?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is obsessed by his favourite TV hero Super Spy and is excited when his very own Super-Spy spy kit arrives in the post. While Mr Bean is pretending to be his favourite character and delighting in all his gadgets he spots some unusual goings on in the Bruisers house next door. Naturally Mr Bean assumes the worst and sets out to rectify the situation.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean becomes scoutmaster for the day, but his obsession with badge collecting does not help him make friends.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: When theres no milk for his tea and for Teddy, Mr. Bean goes to buy some. However, instead of parking near the grocery store because of the traffic warden, he parks his car at a nearby school where he is mistaken by the principal as the new teacher and is forced to teach a group of juvenile delinquents. But he actually may be a better teacher than he thought.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: When ants invade Fung and Miffs tree, our Mushlers offer for them to move in... but the two quickly turn out to be unbearable roommates. So when Fung and Miff break their trampoline, our friends decide its time for them to go back to their homes. But first they need to get rid of the ants...

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush and his friends are determined to win the bark sledge race, but their essential fourth team member drops out. Our friends ask Mushpot to step up from being their coach to racing with them. The Mushelder is reluctant at first but soon reveals the tough competitor he is!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Puff doesnt like change much. And with spring about to burst forth and all the changes spring brings, he is puffing out nervous fog which is blanketing the whole of Mushton. Mush-Mush and friends need to get Puff to relax and celebrate spring together with all the other Mushables!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: So Mushpie can take a break, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit offer to look after the Mushies, assuring her that everything will be fine. But a Mushie pops to become a Mushlet and escapes. Our friends find him in Muddlers clutches! Now, they must figure out a way to save the Mushlet and return the other Mushies to their cave before the return of Mushpie.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlets love Mush-Mushs heroic stories. But when they demand to see him actually do something heroic, Mush-Mush feels he cant back out... and so ends up stuck up a cliff. Relieved to be rescued by Chep and Lilit, Mush-Mush is about to admit that he isnt a hero when the Mushlets find themselves in danger. Now Mush-Mush has no choice but to be a real hero!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: A van pulls up to the rangers cabin to deliver a crate of jars of chocolate spread. While Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a wrecking bar to open it, someone steals the crate.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Like usual, Grizzy picks the door of the Rangers log cabin to come in and make himself comfortable, but this time its impossible to enter! The Lemmings have requisitioned the cabin for a party and barricaded themselves inside. Grizzy has no intention of waiting for an invitation to find a way to get in.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have got their hands on a pack of white beans which have very strange properties: when mixed with soda, anyone who eats them turns into a bouncing ball.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings are having a blast with a bowling game they found in the Rangers storeroom. Grizzy hastens to destroy the pins to ensure his peace and quiet. But the Lemmings discover a remote-control device that can modify the balls weight. By setting it on maximum, the ball could knock over much more than pins: furniture, a bear and even a log cabin!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings inherit a crate that fell off a Canadian army convoy. Inside, a case emits a sort of laser beam that divides objects into multiple miniaturized versions of themselves.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Near the supermarket a machine hands out surprise eggs in exchange for a coin. Amongst the lots to be won, there is a super firework rocket the Lemmings dream of, and a piece of costume jewelry that Grizzy imagines himself giving to his lady-love.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a high-tech gadget that enables you to learn anything within seconds. He can now become the perfect bear!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: How can one peacefully watch a documentary on salmon fish, nice and comfy on the sofa, when the Lemmings are playing chemistry novices with a fun experiment box?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzys TV remote control is stolen by a partridge who collects high-tech objects in his nest perched high up in a tree. This is a case of absolute urgency!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his local bakery to buy a cake but finds he doesnt have any money. He goes to the bank to use the cash machine but he cant remember his pin number. When Mr Beans bankcard is swallowed up by the cash machine theres only one thing to do - go into the machine and fetch it back. The police are alerted but Beans main concern is to get some money and get back to the bakers before all the cakes are sold.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is furious with the untidy state of the streets and all the people who drop litter so he goes on a one-man mission to clean up the town. Armed with several bin bags Mr Bean collects all the rubbish and puts up his own No Littering signs - which have absolutely no effect. When the police show no interest in his campaign Bean builds a homemade vacuuming contraption causing chaos and mayhem wherever he goes.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean decides to do something romantic on Valentines Day for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. But while he is secretly delivering her valentines card Mr Bean finds out he has a love rival for Irmas attention. Bean steps up his efforts and takes Irma on a date to the Valentines Fair only to find his love rival is there too! But will the fortune-tellers prediction be the ticket to a happy ending?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has forgotten hes supposed to be cooking dinner for his long-suffering girlfriend Irma. He dashes to the supermarket to buy some groceries but why buy food when you can win an entire trolley full in an All You Can Eat Competition? But Mr Bean has some stiff competition - no one can eat one of Mr Maggs pies quicker than Mr Maggs himself. Mr Bean has to think fast to win. But after all that eating will Bean still be in the mood to cook a romantic meal?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in need of a sturdy new bookcase and sets off to visit a furniture warehouse. He finds one thats perfect but is outraged when hes told he has to build the bookcase himself! Bean is unfamiliar with flat pack assembly and struggles to construct his new bookcase failing miserably when he discovers hes one screw short. Mr Bean heads back to the shop only to find its closed!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out its Grizzys birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzys peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings party surprises!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is persuaded that hes discovered the ultimate gadget for good living: a pair of connected glasses for watching TV in panoramic view, with all sorts of indicators, namely an intrusion warning signal. There is only one real drawback: the speedometer function which the Lemmings adore.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings clamor for their turn to play with the rangers mobile phone, but Grizzy isnt in the sharing mood. And hes very talented at flattening anything that comes near, without looking up from his game. The Lemmings invent an implacable protection system which should enable them to recover the mobile in complete safety.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is captivated by a mime artist on TV who makes viewers believe in the presence of an invisible wall. To get rid of the Lemmings, who have sights on his jar of Yummy, Grizzy hides the jar and pretends he has an invisible one. When the Lemmings see through the trick, they decide to trap Grizzy with a grand illusion number.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings shiver with cold, sneeze and are glassy-eyed: they have a big fat cold! They look so pitiful that Grizzy doesnt have the heart to throw them into the void, even if they are extremely annoying when they try to snuggle up to him to keep warm. He decides to heal them: the quicker they get better, the quicker Grizzy will be able to get rid of them pitilessly.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Catch the best Shaggy episodes in these thrilling adventures. From mystery-solving to ghost-hunting, theres no quest too tricky for the gang!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Freds worst nightmare comes true when an evil spirit possesses the Mystery Machine and turns his beloved van into an unrelenting monster out to destroy him and the gang before they can solve the mystery.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Buff befriends Mr Freezes snowcrawler Snowy, the other Batwheels bristle at the thought of hanging out with a "bad guy" so Buff sets out to change their minds.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders are hired by the towns volunteer firefighters to build a fire truck. Duty calls and they build on the go as they make rescues throughout Looneyburg.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Witch Hazel hires The Looney Builders to make her house look spooky for Halloween, but things get complicated when they use her off-limits magical things.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwals precious plant once a day while hes on holiday. Its all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbours gadgets while hes away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night but Mr Beans other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwals got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Envious of all the attention his landlady is receiving because of a broken leg, Mr. Bean decides to break his leg too. When he ends up in hospital under the care of the Matron from Hell he discovers there are some kinds of attention even he doesnt enjoy.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Bean is both cajoled by Irma and spurred by his own jealousy of the fund-raising super-star Declan into raising money for the local donkey sanctuary. He tries to thwart Declans success and increase the amount of money hes raising until eventually he finds himself challenging Declan to a sky-diving competition.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The Great Eduardo, violinist supreme, is in town and Irma wants to go to the concert. But Bean wont pay for the tickets. More than that, he claims that he can play the violin better. Now he has to prove it. After a lot of painful sawing, even Eduardo cant bear the noise. He offers to teach Bean, who ends up replacing him in the concert!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Miss Wince takes Mrs. Wicket off on holiday in her brand-new, swanky caravan; and Bean is left behind. Butnever one to let a setback knock his confidence, he decides to build his own caravan and sets off in search of the perfect quiet spot. All would be well if hed only not built the caravan out of Mrs. Wickets garden shed ...

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs will never learn about watching horror movies before bed. He can never sleep afterwards. He jumps at every strange noise - including the ones Skinnys making downstairs, as he blends up a smoothie IN HIS SLEEP. Skinny sleepwalks into trouble all night, and with Specs gibbering in terror, it falls to Lamput to keep the slumbering nerd out of trouble. Apparently you shouldnt wake sleepwalkers. Turning into a rubber band and flinging them at the moon? Thats fine.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Its a night out at the theatre for the Docs but when they spot Lamput in the front row, they decide to give up their night of culture for a night of capture! Lamput escapes backstage where he morphs from scenery into props, then into costume and eventually ends up on stage! The Docs make chase, and end up becoming part of the performance too, much to the Directors dismay. Can the show go on? Or will it be a total flop?

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: The Docs spot Lamput in the audience of a magic show and try to catch him. The chase takes them backstage where Lamput evades the Docs with the help of different magic contraptions until Specs and Skinny unknowingly ends up on stage. They become reluctant assistants to the Magician who is about to perform some death-defying tricks with the help of the Docs!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out its Grizzys birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzys peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings party surprises!

As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: When Grizzy propels the Lemmings out of the log cabin perched on the Great Wall of China, the critters land on a small traditional house in a bamboo forest.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings love sesame nougat but Grizzy, who adores this treat too, steals their box. Quite upset, the rodents search for more, in vain. Instead, they discover the art of energy points in an old Chinese medicine book. Determined to recover their sweets regardless of the cost, the Lemmings activate Grizzys vital points and the bear finds himself completely blocked. Thanks to the book, Grizzy frees himself and learns to master energies in turn.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: After a game that ends abruptly, the Lemmings fall onto the roof of a temple where they discover drawings of Tai Chi movements. When carried out, the exercises generate a ball of energy! The Lemmings test out the sequence of movements on Grizzy, until he is evicted from the cabin and falls onto the temple in turn. His fall unveils a new sequence of movements on a fresco that could create an even stronger energy flow!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a vast natural reserve lost in the middle of the untamed wilderness, there is a small haven of human civilization: the forest rangers house. Because he is (from his point of view) the most evolved animal on earth, the bear Grizzy feels its only natural that the rangers house becomes his territory as soon as its owner is away. No other animal dares to contest this "bears privilege"except the most inoffensive, stupid and ridiculous mammal family that exists: the Lemmings - who also move into the house as soon as the ranger is gone. Grizzy and the Lemmings lead a merciless battle over the house in an atmosphere of total madness, where the two adversaries constantly try to outdo each other with nasty tricks!

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: While mopping the kitchen floor, Tom uses an odd-looking sponge on a plate to clean up the mess. But the "sponge" turns out to be a rare truffle, which the estates new pig ate. To pacify Cates, Tom and Jerry must find out whether the animal is also good at hunting truffles.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Ginger places her grannys old cuckoo clock in the hall, and it still works! However, the newly arrived clock causes issues when Tom wants to catch the tiny wooden bird inside and Tuffy wants to befriend it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: At midnight, a gothic lady cat appears with her favorite sinister plant creatures including her personal favorite: Fang, a big man-eating plant. As long as its sealed in the hothouse, nothing can go wrong. But Tom, Jerry and Tuffy soon have their hands full with the escaped plant.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Cates appears and assigns Tom the job of sweeping the estates chimneys, warning him not to upset the Duchesss new exotic pet bird. Unfortunately, both the pet bird and a stork at the top of the chimney think Jerry is a worm. Soon chaos breaks out, hurting Toms cleaning efforts.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom finds out he won a contest to be in a cat food commercial, his behavior turns smug. This irritates Jerry, who goes to great lengths to ruin the commercial shoot at the house as Tom struggles in his role.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Peter, a pretentious cheapskate poodle, demands that Tom and Jerry help protect his precious sapphire egg on a train journey but wont pay their fare. The cat and mouse become stowaways and go to a lot of trouble to do their job, but the outcome is unexpected.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bam must lead a new super vehicle team consisting of Nightbike, Goldie, Grundy, and Kitty after the Legion of Zoom traps the rest of the Batwheels in the Batcave.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: On Halloween Night, Poison Ivy brings all the pumpkins to life, creating an army of Snack-O-Lanterns that are eating all the candy. Its up to Redbird and Bam to end her pumpkin panic to save Gothams Halloween fun, as well as their own.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: The gang goes to Salem, Massachusetts, for the historical festival, only to discover history repeating itself as a demon has been set loose on the town, supposedly summoned by a witch as revenge for the infamous 17th-century Salem witch trials.

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Shaggy drags the gang to an arcade where hes determined to finally collect enough tickets to win the prize hes wanted since he was a boy. Unfortunately, the animatronic mascot of the place has apparently come to life and has other ideas. / Fred comes face to face with his longstanding nemesis Captain Cutler who seems to have turned over new leaf as a restaurateur but is plagued by a ghostly pirate.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwals precious plant once a day while hes on holiday. Its all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbours gadgets while hes away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night but Mr Beans other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwals got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy has anticipated everything for his birthday and plans on spending a peaceful day in the cabin doing his favorite activities. But when the Lemmings find out its Grizzys birthday, they devise other plans. Farewell, Grizzys peaceful day - make way for the Lemmings party surprises!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings catch a grasshopper that can give you whatever your heart desires in abundance. All you need to do is set the grasshopper on its head while concentrating hard on what you want. As discretion is not the Lemmings strong point, Grizzy ends up understanding where their profusion of toys is coming from. Grizzy decides that its his turn to hunt down the grasshopper.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy is bothered by an object stuck in between the sofa cushions: a big fur lemming puppet glove. He puts his hand inside and has fun pretending that the puppet is strangling him. The Lemmings believe that the puppet is a Super Lemming whos stronger than Grizzy and start to obey it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy discovers the leftovers of a Halloween party in the rangers cabin, which was entirely redecorated for the occasion, with stupefaction. But if the curious ambiance perturbs Grizzy, the Lemmings are in seventh heaven and have a whale of a time jumping up and down inside a cooking pot full of marshmallows. Grizzy wants to get rid of it until he accidentally swallows a marshmallow and discovers the best flavor of his life.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wants to give the she-bear hes in love with a plastic ring which he finds really swell. But since the object was found in the trash, he needs to wash it first. And the Lemmings are using the sole bar of soap in the house as a bobsleigh.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy finds a strange American Indian figurine with the power to switch the spirits of two living beings and finds himself imprisoned in the body of a caribou. He immediately tries to activate the reverse procedure, but the Lemmings steal the figurine in order to turn into a partridge and fly away.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While salmon fishing on the riverbank, Grizzy hauls in an unusual catch: an old hand mirror straight out of a fairytale. Instead of showing the reflection of the person who holds it, the mirror shows an idealized vision of his surroundings. Whether it be Grizzy or the Lemmings, everyone sees the world of his dreams, and no one wants to share it.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: In a casing that fell from a circus caravan, the Lemmings find a magic stick that can enchant objects and make them come alive. Grizzy is sure that a stick like that would save him a lot of work, the only problem is how to get it from the Lemmings, who have become sorcerers apprentices?

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Whilst trying to stop the Lemmings from playing with a crate of firework rockets Grizzy is literally carried away with them when the largest specimen shoots off

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Fed up with Toms cat hair, Rick buys the "Suck-Up," a next level Roomba-like cleaner. The Suck-Up patrols the house and cleans nonstop. But when the self-programming machine turns on them both and takes over the house -- Tom and Jerry team up to defeat it.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: The storm of the century is brewing -- according to Tuffy and Jerry, that is, who are giving Tom a little payback for tormenting them earlier. Spike also gets caught up in the hysteria over the impending storm. When Spike uncovers the ruse, the mice must brace for their own storm.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Its picture day! Spike and Tom end up covered in mud and in the Laundro-mutt grooming van. A fight leads to a runaway van and a bath they both wanted to avoid. Tuffy and Jerry are determined to be included in this years picture.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: When Tom and Jerry accidentally ruin Spikes birthday party for Tyke, he forces them to take over. But no matter what they do at the puppy birthday bash, nothing seems to work out.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Toodles hires Tom and Jerry to investigate and protect her against a threat to her tuna can inheritance, but a mysterious figure keeps trying to hurt them as they investigate.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom and Jerry accidentally get locked out in the snow. They chase each other in the winter wonderland, until they realize they cant get back in. They work together to get back indoors as the weather turns ugly.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Jerry causes Tom to lose eight out of his nine lives. Tom uses magic to bring them back, and instead is stuck with eight annoying ghost versions of himself.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is under strict instructions to water Mr Paliwals precious plant once a day while hes on holiday. Its all going fine, and Mr Bean is enjoying playing with his neighbours gadgets while hes away. However, one day he forgets his task and has to let himself in late at night but Mr Beans other neighbour, Bruiser, spots the suspicious activity, and thinks Mr Paliwals got a burglar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean takes part in a Fun Run. He starts next to his biggest enemy: the fat guy who stole his parking space. Fun Run or not, Bean is going to beat this guy at the finish line, even if he has to take a taxi along the way.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr. Bean becomes obsessed with gaming after being introduced by Mrs. Wickets nephew. He decides he must have his own console, only to discover how expensive they are. But as luck would have it, he arrives at the shop at closing time to discover that tomorrow there will be a special sale. All he has to do is be first in line.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mrs. Wicket demands that Bean stay in to take delivery of a new lounge chair.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Redbird tries his hand at espionage as V-8, the Super-Spy, he quickly realizes hes gotten in over his head.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Bibi has a terrible no-good day after she keeps messing up and lets Joker get away. She doesnt think he can help Batgirl anymore, but a bad today doesnt mean itll be a bad tomorrow".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Badcomputer captures Bibi and disguises Jestah to take her place with the Batwheels so that Jestah can steal the Batcomputers motherboard. / When a group of alley dogs, aided by a heroic stray, are saved from Catwoman by kind-hearted Buff, he brings them all back to live in the Batcave. / Batwing and Goldie secretly decide to participate in the Gotham Air-Show. / Bam brings Catwomans Catmobile to life so the Batwheels can have even teams for their game of "Bat-Ball".

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After agreeing to swap motherboards and change bodies, the Batwheels have to quickly learn to drive a mile in each others wheels in time to stop the approaching Legion of Zoom!

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders: Hard Hat Time
programme.desc: The crew plays hide-and-seek at headquarters, and Tweety is the seeker.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Marvin the Martian hires The Looney Builders to build a doghouse on Mars for his puppy, K-9. Daffy soon bonds with K-9 and comes up with a plan to prolong their playtime.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: When Daffys cool cousin Billy hires The Looney Builders to build her an art studio, Daffy tries to show off to prove how cool he is.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings are hungry! While fighting over a jar of Yummy chocolate spread, the jar is destroyed. But Grizzy discovers an ingenious manner to recover the remains of another Yummy jar using instant Chinese noodles as inspiration. The result is delicious. Grizzy and the Lemmings will once again fight over this new Yummy-based recipe: Choco-noodles.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings fight over a jar of Yummy which is mysteriously sucked up into a strange gravestone locked with a puzzle. Grizzy smashes open the gravestone but it contains another box made of unbreakable wood protected with a codex system. Our characters crack the code and are sucked into the box in turn. They discover that to get out, they will have to resolve a series of new puzzles, each one more complex than the last.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Annoyed by the Lemmings new magnetic train, Grizzy propels the whole lot of them far from the cabin. The rodents land in the neighboring hut of a sorcerer and a mysterious mask falls onto one of them, endowing him with the power of telekinesis. The Lemmings are thrilled! They return to the cabin to explore this new magic power. Perched upon pieces of furniture, they fly around the room to finish their life-size flying train game!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases after the Lemmings, who have loaded a jar of Yummy into their remote-control driven car. Where the bear gets to the gas station, he destroys the vehicle and recovers the chocolate spread. The rodents find little mini-cars and chase Grizzy all the way back to the cabin, where they trip him up and intercept the coveted jar. Helpless, the bear sets out after them, until he runs into a tank truck filled with Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: To recover the jar of Yummy that Grizzy confiscated from them, the Lemmings decide to infest the bears coat with fleas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy wakes up starving but the cupboards are empty. While the Lemmings play nearby with an elephant, the bear swipes their peanut reserves. Not at all pleased, the rodents decide to recover their bag of nuts and use the elephants trunk like a powerful vacuum cleaner to hurl all sorts of objects at Grizzy. In the heat of the battle, the Lemmings discover a pack of fabulous peanut and chili pepper cookies that seem to make the pachyderm ultra-powerful.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Victory! The Docs finally catch Lamput but the timing could not be worse, because Boss Mom is here to visit and she does not take kindly to her friend Lamput being imprisoned. Against his better judgement but to please his mother, Boss orders the Docs to chaperone and serve Boss Mom and Lamput as they spend time shopping, being pampered and spoiling themselves. Lamput cant believe his luck and the Docs cant believe theirs either! But when Boss Mom finds herself in mild peril, theres a chance of redemption and the possibility of a her finding a new favourite.

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: Specs And Skinny are late to work and Boss is mighty angry! The Docs cook up a quick, fake story of how they were chasing Lamput all over the city. It was a real tough chase across various terrains and thats what got them late to work!Boss calmly hears out their story and then opens his cabinet to show Lamput already caught and sitting there in a jar! The Docs sweat! We now see the Docs running all over the various terrains of the city with Boss chasing them on his scooter!

programme.title: Lamput
programme.desc: While pursuing Lamput on a boat out at sea, Skinny is enchanted by the music of sirens who are taken by his singing. The sirens take a hypnotized Skinny away to their island where he is to sing for them or be a prisoner. Specs team up with Lamput to attempt a rescue.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is dismayed to find that the bin men are refusing to take his wheelie bin because the lid wont shut as its too full of rubbish and by the time hes shut it, theyve gone! So he sneaks the bin in front of other houses, hoping they wont notice and pick it up. Meanwhile, Mrs Wicket realises that her purse has ended up in the rubbish, and is chasing Mr Bean who is chasing the bin men!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: The clumsy hero is kept awake by the deafening sound of roadworks outside his bedroom window, but a plot to restore peace by feeding the workmen goes spectacularly wrong.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean spots a rare book - the Teddy Bear Haunting - in a bookshop, but its too expensive to buy. He secretly tries to read it in the shop until hes thrown out. To his dismay someone else then buys the book so he follows the buyer around trying to read over his shoulder. Will Mr Bean manage to get to the end of the book before getting spotted?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and Teddy are enjoying a day at the arcade, when Mr Bean gets carried away with the dance machine, knocking Teddy onto the floor. Teddys picked up, put on a trolley of stuffed toys and figurines and soon enough, hes been put in the claw machine as a prize! Mr Bean has run out of coins, so has to find a way of winning Teddy back without looking like hes cheating!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!
programme.desc: Daphne brengt de gang mee naar een Victoriaans moordmysteriefeest, zodat ze zich mooi kunnen aankleden en een nepmysterie kunnen oplossen voor de verandering. Maar wanneer een onthoofde graaf (DAVID KAYE) daadwerkelijk mensen begint te ontvoeren, moet de gang boef pakken!

programme.title: Be Cool, Scooby-Doo!

programme.desc: Tom is mistakenly placed in a shelter for homeless animals and forced to join the shelters rock-n-roll while Jerry lives the life of Riley back home.

programme.desc: A lineage check determines that Spike is descended from British aristocracy.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: Tom is tricked into believing he is invisible.

programme.desc: Tyke undergoes a personality change after watching too many cop shows on TV.

programme.title: The Tom and Jerry Show
programme.desc: A couple of tricksters use Lil Quacker as their "magnificent" side show act in order to bilk the locals out of their cash.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings try to catch a bat to play rodeo, disturbing Grizzy as he plays his favorite game on the rangers mobile. But when the phone is hit and its alarm activated, a submarine sonar sound is emitted. When the bat hears it, it seems to become docile.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings discover the rangers latest acquisition: a 3D printer that will duplicate anything at all in miniature format. Grizzy wants to redecorate the cabin with figurines bearing his effigy, but first he needs to get rid of the Lemmings. Without getting them mixed up with their perfect resin replicas.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy and the Lemmings clumsily destroy the TV remote control while fighting over who gets to watch their favorite program. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: While trying to stop the Lemmings from playing their extreme trampoline game, Grizzy slips on the canvas and unwittingly executes an amazing somersault in front of his beloved she-bear. programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have hitched up a racoon with a sweet tooth to their sled and get a ride by throwing cookies in front of the creature with a sling. programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: Witch Hazel hires The Looney Builders to make her house look spooky for Halloween, but things get complicated when they use her off-limits magical things.

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders

programme.title: Bugs Bunny Builders
programme.desc: The Looney Builders race against the clock to build Cecil Turtle a new racetrack. Daffy gets caught up in his own desire to race and changes part of the build.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After snagging an ultra-fuel-cell upgrade, the Ducky Boat suddenly becomes the fastest vehicle in Gotham. Later, confident leader Bam must rally the Batwheels to stop the turbo-Ducky!

programme.title: Batwheels

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: After he causes the Batwing to crash, Bam becomes obsessed with making it up to her during a high-stakes aerial mission against Penguin and his giant ducky blimp.

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: Everyone is ecstatic when Bibi, Batgirl, and Robin capture Toyman and his Do-Over remote - except for Bibi, who failed to stick the landing on a big jump. Unwilling to accept her failure, Bibi uses Toymans Do-Over remote until she perfects her jump!

programme.title: Batwheels
programme.desc: When Bam is sent to take on Prank, Redbird is forced to hang back because The Jokers van is too dangerous! When Bam discovers that Redbird secretly tagged along, hes upset... until Redbird bails him out of a tight spot.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is unimpressed with a horror movie he sees at the cinema and reckons he can do much better. Bean sets out to create his very own home movie masterpiece featuring Mrs Wicket Irma and Teddy! The screening in the garden is a huge success but will Mrs Wicket be pleased with her makeover and starring role?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has to look after Mrs Wickets pet goldfish while she is away. With a ravenous Scrapper sniffing around Bean ends up becoming more bodyguard than babysitter. But when he manages to lose his fishy friend Mr Bean takes a nightmare journey down the sewer and back to his neighbours house via the park. Can Mr Bean get the pesky pet back in the bowl before Mrs Wicket returns home?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean wins two tickets for an exotic cruise and naturally he takes Teddy along for the trip of a lifetime. Once aboard the huge ocean liner Mr Bean soon settles into a life of luxury but while showing off to a new friend Bean becomes man overboard and stranded on a dessert island. The hungrier he gets the wilder he becomes and desperate to find a way off the island.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean goes to his favourite china shop to buy a new cup for Teddy but when he opens his wallet he doesnt have enough money to pay for it. When he sees a poster for the local funfair where the stalls have cash prizes Bean is determined to win himself some money on the Coconut Shy. But after many unsuccessful attempts he realises its a fix and lets everyone know about it. Naturally this doesnt go down well with the stallholder who wants revenge and a chase around the funfair ensues.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Beans electricity is cut off when Mrs Wicket sees her electricity bill, but he has a back-up idea - a wind turbine. With the voice of Rowan Atkinson

programme.desc: Chep has to give the Mushlets a talk about spiders. But talking in front of a group makes Chep nervous. Mush-Mush offers to do it instead. Problem is Mush-Mushs knowledge of spiders is so bad he ends up getting caught by one!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: The Mushlers want Amanita to join in telling monster stories. But Amanita doesnt believe in monsters. So they take her on a monster hunt and find more than they imagined.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chep wants to be brave enough to join in the daring games that Mush-Mush and Lilit like to play. So he gets some protective moss pants that make him not only indestructible but also fashionable and a bit cocky. Woo, its the new Chep!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Mush-Mush really wants to get over his fear of snakes. Truff really wants to get over his fear of ants. So they team up to help each other overcome their fears ... maybe.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy chases the Lemmings throughout the castle to swipe the delicious jelly cake they were about to eat. He locks them inside a closet and makes off with the dessert.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings have fun bouncing off the backs of green frogs while Grizzy chases some mosquitos buzzing around him. Displeased, the rodents replace Grizzys green frogs with poisonous orange ones that paralyze anyone who touches them!

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings improvise a trampoline with bagpipes, only each jump is accompanied by a deafening outburst. Grizzy steps in and hurls the object far from the castle.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize an obstacle course in their cabin. Grizzy ejects the Lemmings from the cabin and they crash onto an Incan temple where they discover a spheric object that can control the Earths rotation.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings get hold of an old pinball machine and install it in the cabin. Their furious party interrupts Grizzys nap and the bear threatens to break the contraption.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Grizzy, a big chocolate lover, is growing a young cacao tree under an ultraviolet lamp. During a trampoline session, the Lemmings accidentally break the lamp, provoking a supernatural reaction.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: During a fight, Grizzy and the Lemmings stumble upon a Mayan temple lost in the jungle. Once inside, they set off a magic reaction that creates doubles of themselves at different ages. They now have a Grizzy babe and elderly Lemmings. Grizzy tries to get the young bear interested in a documentary on salmon, while the Lemmings want to initiate their ancestors to dance. But age differences are not so easily defeated.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: Short on food supplies, Grizzy has gone out to gather fruit. He comes back with a basketful but discovers that the Lemmings have stolen the last of the chocolate spread.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings take off with the last jar of Yummy chocolate spread. Grizzy catches up with them but they drop the jar and it lands in a nearby sacred temple. Grizzy and the Lemmings must solve riddles along the path to the Yummy.

programme.title: Grizzy and the Lemmings
programme.desc: The Lemmings organize wrestling combats on the living room couch. Grizzy, weary of the clamor, stops the match. The displeased Lemmings retaliate, but during their fight the cabins wood floor caves in and they all fall into an old sidecar!

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is in the library studying his family heritage. Someone brings to his attention Mr Beans resemblance to a certain Lord Bean. Mr Bean sets off to track down his ancestral home (a castle) in Scotland where he is welcomed with open arms. But owning a castle is not cheap. Can Mr Bean escape before he runs out of money and has there been a case of mistaken identity?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean and his beloved car find themselves in a crash for crash battle with his arch nemesis the Reliant Robin. Its a contest to find out who can hold their nerve the longest. Does Mr Bean win? Is his car left unscathed? And more importantly do we find out who the driver of the Reliant Robin really is?

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean has got everything ready for Irmas birthday; card cake candles but he just needs to get her some flowers. But nothing goes to plan as Mr Bean inadvertently causes a car crash involving a bride on her wedding day. Theres no time to lose as Mr Bean promises hell get the bride to the church on time. Irma is not a happy lady as Mr Bean is distracted by the task in hand.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: Mr Bean is keen to own a brand new smart phone when he discovers all the wonderful things it can do. But after a trip to the mobile phone shop he is horrified at how much they cost and decides to build his own one. Beans phone may be bulky but it comes with a whole range of built in gadgets especially useful during a race to The Tower of London.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: A confused Japanese tourist couple mistake Mr Beans house for a hotel and because of the language barrier it is difficult to explain otherwise. When the hapless holidaymakers offer to pay to stay Mr Bean and Mrs Wicket see a way of making some money and pretend their house is indeed a hotel. But its not long before the tourists start to smell a fish.

programme.title: Mr. Bean: The Animated Series
programme.desc: While Mr. Bean is taking photos of wildlife, he sees big footprints belonging to a dinosaur. He starts running away but then gets an idea to take a photo of these footprints, hoping hell become famous. However, the dinosaur turns out to be part of a set for a movie called Jurassic Hero and Bean is added to the cast.

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Chanterelle has built a whistle that can reproduce the most beautiful sound of the forest: the one of the Nightingale. When the whistle disappears, Mush-Mush, Chep and Lilit soon discover that it has been stolen by a beetle. In order to finally hear what a real Nightingale sounds like, theyll have to get it back!

programme.title: Mush-Mush and the Mushables
programme.desc: Wanting to rush off to climb Mush Mountain, Mush-Mush is in a hurry checking nectar level in flowers... a job that takes time and care. Soon Mush-Mushs haste causes disaster when he scares all the bees away. Now Mush-Mush and friends have to find a way to lure the bees back...

programme.title: Inside Africa
programme.desc: Rising dramatically from the plains of southern Malawi, Mount Mulanje is a soaring granite massif known as the "Island in the Sky." It is home to a fragile and unique ecosystem and at its heart stands the Mulanje cedar (Widdringtonia whytei), a tree so rare its found nowhere else on Earth. Once covering vast slopes of the mountain, the cedar is now critically endangered. Illegal logging, wildfires, and climate change have brought it to the brink, with only a handful of mature, seed-producing trees ever documented in recent years. Declared Malawis national tree, the cedar has become a symbol of both loss and resilience. We explore the bold and deeply collaborative effort to bring this species back from the edge. At the core of this movement are local Malawians, young men and women who grow thousands of cedar seedlings in grassroots nurseries, carry them in woven baskets to high- altitude planting sites, and spend days traversing rugged trails to restore whats been lost. Their work is physically demanding and often overlooked, but essential to the projects success.

programme.title: POV
programme.desc: Walk down the street in Tokyo, and there will be echoes of it everywhere. The subtle, sophisticated chic of iki was born during Japans Edo period and still defines Tokyos modern urban pulse. Its seen as a core value in Japanese taste and behavior, from the way people dress to how they express themselves. So what is iki? In its most basic form its an aesthetic ideal: a subtle, effortless elegance that values authenticity, refinement and unpretentious style. In response to strict social codes banning overt displays of wealth, the merchant class of Edo (now Tokyo) developed iki as a discreet form of rebellion. Subtle details like luxurious kimono linings or intricate accessories were hidden beneath plain exteriors. Over time this urban code filtered from fashion into the arts - which for the first time in Edo society were flourishing beyond the upper class. Hanako Montgomery explores her home city Tokyo through the lens of its former Edo identity. She traces the footsteps of the people that fashioned iki, and meets the Tokyoites of today keeping this urban code of understated cool alive today through fashion, art and poetry.

programme.title: Marketplace Europe
programme.desc: We hit the red carpet for a look at the state of Europes film industry, from Venice to London. In the face of economic uncertainty and rising tariffs, how will the creative industry respond? As countries like Italy and the UK replace Hollywood as the go-to destinations for on-location shooting, we speak to some of the major players in the industry to find out how Europe has catapulted itself forward, and whether it can stay at the front of the pack.

programme.title: Blueprint
programme.desc: Many people travel to Mongolia to disconnect, to escape into the vast wilderness and switch off. But for Mongolians, connectivity is everything. The country has 3.5 million people and 5 million active phone numbers. Everywhere you look in the capital city Ulaanbaatar, people are glued to their phones. A vibrant startup scene in the city is driving innovation and diversifying Mongolias economy beyond its mining roots, fueled by a young, ambitious, and entrepreneurial population. A new digital infrastructure is not only reshaping how people travel, live and shop here - but tackling some of the countrys biggest challenges: congestion, pollution and climate change. Innovations first cultivated in the city are taking root in remote corners of the country, where 30% of the population still live nomadic lifestyles. Forget Silicon Valley, this is the Silicon Steppe, where homegrown startups are powering Mongolias digital transformation.

programme.desc: Kun tarkastajat etsivat rahtilastista laitonta marijuanaa, paljastuu lapivalaisussa saadytonta materiaalia. Varikas hahmo kiinnittaa huomion.

programme.title: Arvokaman etsijat
programme.desc: Drew tapaa antiikkikauppiaiden seuraavaa sukupolvea. Han tapaa aidin ja pojan tiimin Macclesfieldissa, ja nuoren modernismiin erikoistuvan valittajan Leedsissa.

programme.title: Arvokaman etsijat

programme.title: Arvokaman etsijat

programme.title: Ruotsin rajavartijat

Silla valin Candace pohtii, miksi Jeremy tykkaa hanesta ja tri Tollontyo ottaa kayttoon Sadenaattorinsa. / Candace lupaa Stacylle viettaa paivan taman kanssa ilman Jeremya, mutta yllattaen Jeremy tarttuu kiinni hanen kylkeensa. Han syyttaa veljiaan ja yrittaa saada nama irrottamaan Jeremyn samalla kun han itse yrittaa piilotella tata Stacylta. Samaan aikaan Isabella tahtoisi paasta viettamaan aikaa kahdestaan Finiaksen kanssa, mutta tama jahtaa ystavineen jattilaisrobottikoiraa ympari kaupunkia.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat valtavan terashain Danvillen vuosittaisia Satamapaivia varten, mutta Candace on jalleen paattanyt karayttaa heidat. Stacyn ja kapteeni Tihrun avustamana Candace lahtee metsastamaan haita ja veljiaan. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo onnistuu sotkemaan itsensa Suolavesitoffeennaattoriinsa. / Finias ja Ferb saavat selville, etta Kuun heikompi painovoima tekee jaatelosta erityisen hyvaa, joten he lastaavat raketin tayteen lehmia ja lentavat Kuuhun testaamaan teoriaa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo hyokkaa naapurinsa parvekekasvien kimppuun Kosteusimunaattorillaan ja Stacy auttaa Candacea kokkaamaan Jeremylle romanttisen aterian.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb rakentavat valtavan terashain Danvillen vuosittaisia Satamapaivia varten, mutta Candace on jalleen paattanyt karayttaa heidat. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo hyokkaa naapurinsa parvekekasvien kimppuun Kosteusimunaattorillaan ja Stacy auttaa Candacea kokkaamaan Jeremylle romanttisen aterian.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finiaksella on syntymapaivat ja Irving paattaa, etta Isabella, Buford ja Baljeet saavat auttaa hanta tekemaan lahjaksi videokoosteen Finiaksen parhaista hetkista. Candace yrittaa kerata videotodisteita Finiasta vastaan, muttei raaski karayttaa veljeaan taman syntymapaivana. Silla valin majuri Sahkeinen ja Karl arvioivat Perryn toimintaa agenttina ja tri Tollontyo kay lapi vanhoja keksintojaan selvittaakseen miksi ne ovat epaonnistuneet.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Finias ja Ferb haluavat yllattaa aitinsa ja rakentavat supertietokoneen selvittaakseen, mika ilahduttaisi hanta eniten. / Finias ja Ferb muuttavat kotinsa hupitaloksi ystaviensa avustuksella. programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace hukkaa kannykkansa ja rikkoo sitten aidilta saamansa uuden kannykan, han pelkaa joutuvansa pulaan. Mutta Finias ja Ferb korjaavat puhelimen ja lisaavat siihen runsaasti uusia toimintoja. Candace on tyytyvainen kunnes puhelin telesiirtaa hanet Paasiaissaarille! Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa Noutonaattorin. / Isa katselee lapsuutensa lempisarjaa, mutta television taikamattoajelu ei veda vertoja ajan kultaamille muistoille. Siispa Finias ja Ferb paattavat tehda hanelle oikean lentavan maton. Silla valin Candace yrittaa ennustaa tulevaisuutta onnenkeksien avulla ja tohtori Tollontyo on varastanut hankalasti puhdistettavia aineita Tahranaattoriaan varten.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun Candace pilaa kampauksensa juuri ennen Jeremyn aidin jarjestamaa hyvantekevaisyysgaalaa, han joutuu turvautumaan Finiaksen ja Ferbin apuun. Han ei kuitenkaan noudata poikien ohjeita ja on pian kokonaan karvan peitossa. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo on rakentanut Tosi-Pahanaattorin ja odottaa innolla, etta paasee nakemaan, mita se tekee. / On Danvillen vuosittaisten lihamurekefestivaalien aika ja aiti paasee toimimaan mureketuomarina. Kun Buford rikkoo festivaalien pomppulinnan, Finias ja Ferb rakentavat jattilaislinnan sen tilalle. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo, joka on paattanyt voittaa murekekilpailun, kayttaa Madattajanaattoria pilatakseen muiden kilpailijoiden murekkeet.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Esihistorian hamarissa luolapojat Finias ja Ferb keksivat ensin pyoran ja sitten ensimmaisen auton. Candace yrittaa tietenkin karayttaa veljiaan ja keksii vahingossa samalla tulen. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo kehittaa alkukantaisen naattorin, jonka avulla han pyrkii viemaan asuinpaikan kehittyneemmilta lajitovereiltaan. / 1500-luvun Kiinassa pahamaineinen rosvopaallikko Tollokaani kaappaa hallitsijan tyttaren, prinsessa Isabellan. Finias, Ferb, Buford ja Baljeet lahtevat etsimaan nokkaelainmestari Perrya Jyrkimman Jyrkkyyden Jyrkkavuorelta pelastaakseen prinsessan.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Kun aiti tarjoutuu viettamaan koko paivan Candacen kanssa, tama on varma, etta paasee viimein karayttamaan veljensa mutta he eivat teekaan mitaan mielenkiintoista! Perry epailee tohtori Tollontyon liittyvan asiaan ja paatyy avustamaan perivihollistaan. / Candace pyytaa, etta Stacy hypnotisoi hanet, niin etta han voi nauttia treffeista Jeremyn kanssa miettimatta veljiensa karayttamista. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo menettaa muistinsa uusimman naattorinsa takia ja Norm kayttaa tilaisuutta hyvakseen teeskennellakseen hanen poikaansa.

programme.title: Finias ja Ferb
programme.desc: Candace on murtanut nilkkansa ja on toipilaana kun Finias ja Ferb rakentavat stratosfaarin ionisoijaa. Koska Candace haluaa silti paasta karayttamaan veljensaa, han joutuu keksimaan luovia keinoja saadakseen aidin huomion. Silla valin tohtori Tollontyo valmistautuu hyokkaamaan Kanakeittonaattorillaan ja Perryn taytyy pysayttaa hanet. / Flynn-Fletcherit ovat palaamassa kotiin autoretkelta ja Finias ja Ferb paattavat rakentaa perinteisen amerikkalaisen tienvarsikahvilan retkiauton katolle. Silla valin Perryn taytyy estaa tohtori Tollontyota kuljettamasta rajahdysherkkaa nestetta kaupunkiin.

programme.title: Sangarid
programme.desc: Hoogne seikluskomoodia Sangarid viib meid 1980. aastatesse. Kolm Eesti kutti pgenevad Nukogude Liidust valismaale, et vabas maailmas elada, just nii effi elu, nagu nahtud telesarjades Miami Vice, Knight Rider ja Santa Barbara. Sbrad vetakse svenssonite maal vastu kui telised kangelased, kes murdsid labi raudse eesriide. Kui aga meediakara vaibub, avastavad meie sangarid, et neist on saanud tavalised tulikad sisserandajad. raelamiseks tuleb hakata tegema midagi nii nmedat nagu too! Poisid pole siiski loomult allaandjad ja uritavad uute pooraste plaanidega laanemaailmas labi luua. Nuud aga lahevad asjad hoopis hulluks! R: Jaak Kilmi. O: Mart Pius, Karl-Andreas Kalmet, Veiko Porkanen.

programme.title: Blue Lights
programme.desc: Leest saab Mount Edeni uus boss. Kuna Canning avaldab tulemuste saamiseks survet, juhatab Shane Tommy hadaohtu.

programme.title: Kuulsuste lahing
programme.desc: Kuulsuste lahing lahutab ja koondab meelt, sest kokku saavad rahva absoluutsed lemmikud - malumang ja Eesti naitlejad. Esimeses viktoriinilahingus vtavad mtu kaks pealinna teatrit. Tallinna Linnateatri au kaitsevad Piret Kalda, Argo Aadli ja Andero Ermel ning Eesti Draamateater on kohal koosseisus Merle Palmiste, Rein Oja ja Taavi Teplenkov. Lahingut ohjavad Maire Aunaste ja Marko Reikop.

programme.title: ERR.ee uudised
programme.desc: ERR.ee uudised

programme.title: Japans Wild Year
programme.desc: Jaapaniga seostuvad tihti esmalt suured linnad, aga tegelikult on 73% Jaapanist kaetud metsiku loodusega ja seal vib naha puutumatuid plismetsi, magesid ning rannikuid. Kohtume paljude haruldaste loomadega, kellest mned elavad ainult Jaapanis, ja naeme nende elu labi terve aastaringi.

programme.title: Osooni lood
programme.desc: "Kui tahad leida midagi uut, siis kai vanu radu pidi", seda Fred Jussi mtet jargides on loodusfotograaf Remo Savisaar leidnud Alutaguse metsas imelise paiga, mis suudab alati oma elurikkusega ullatada. Autor Sander Loite.

programme.title: Namaste
programme.desc: Reisisaates elame kaasa kolme sbra seiklustele eksootilises Indias. Ajal, kus reisimine on raskendatud, meenutavad pnevat ja salaparast Indiat Ott Nool, Christopher Rajaveer ja Karl Robert Saaremae. Sarja avaosas tuleb reisiseltskonnal kohaneda suurlinna New Delhi ilude ja valudega.

programme.title: Wikmani poisid
programme.desc: Eelmises osas toimus sunnipaevapidu. Nuud aga juavad Wikmani poistele katte kiiremad ja toisemad ajad - saabunud on kevad ning koos sellega ka kumnenda klassi lpetamine. Ees seisavad eksamid, mis nii mnelegi poisile tsist peavalu valmistavad. Direktor Wikman snastab oma vaimse testamendi: "Mida vanemaks te saate, seda enam hakkab teie eesti haritlase ideaal minu omast erinema. Aga mingites kige uldisemates asjades - aususes ja truuduses teatud vaartustele - on ju minu ideaal tegelikult igaveste ideaalide meie variant. Eesti variant. Ja sellele peate te truuks jaama." Stsenaristid Hugo Ader, Andres Maimik, Anu Soolep ja Vilja Palm. Reissoor-lavastaja Vilja Palm, operaatorid Aarne Kraam ja Rein Lillmaa, kunstnik Tiiu bi, helilooja Sven Grunberg, toimetaja Hanneli Reili.

programme.title: Hommik Anuga

programme.title: Muusikast Mihkel Rauaga
programme.desc: Artistid on uhiskonna moeikoonid. Popstaarid on algatanud moevoolusid, aga ka polariseerinud uhiskonda - Eestigi maletab karvaste ja diskopepude vahelist sda, kus pelgalt vale muusikastiili pooldamist valjendava riietuse tttu vis tanaval peksa saada. Kui tsiselt vetakse oma lavariietust Eestis tana? Mihkel Raua vestluskaaslasteks on Hendrik Sal-Saller, Jaagup Kreem, Kohver ja Korea 5MIINUSEST, Anne Veski, Merle Lilje, Heidy Tamme, Ivo Linna, Yasmyn, Liis Lemsalu, Gameboy Tetris, Laura Pldvere, Juri Pootsmann, Alar Kotkas, Jana Hallas, Kristiina Jeromans ja Karolin Kuusik.

programme.title: Sangarid
programme.desc: Hoogne seikluskomoodia Sangarid viib meid 1980. aastatesse. Kolm Eesti kutti pgenevad Nukogude Liidust valismaale, et vabas maailmas elada, just nii effi elu, nagu nahtud telesarjades Miami Vice, Knight Rider ja Santa Barbara. Sbrad vetakse svenssonite maal vastu kui telised kangelased, kes murdsid labi raudse eesriide. Kui aga meediakara vaibub, avastavad meie sangarid, et neist on saanud tavalised tulikad sisserandajad. raelamiseks tuleb hakata tegema midagi nii nmedat nagu too!
